uk.co.indigo.play.rfid.xml
Class LabelXMLParser

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.indigo.play.rfid.xml.LabelXMLParser

public class LabelXMLParser
extends java.lang.Object

Parses XML print jobs. The are usually picked up from the queue by the DirQueueMonitor.

Author:
milbuw

                     throws LabelParserException
Get the label quantity from the print job.

getFields

public java.util.List getFields()
                         throws LabelParserException
Get a list of data fields from the print job.

Returns:
The list of fields. This is a list of RFIDField objects.
Throws:
LabelParserException - Thrown if no data fields could be found.
